title: First fonts already launched!
content:
Good morning!  
Already launched two fonts. Working on some more but i would like to have your opinion.  
Of course, they still not as good as most of the typeface works around here but... maybe one day!

[www.myfonts.com/foundry/youremin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015181620/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/youremin "www.myfonts.com/foundry/youremin")
author: sendoushi

comments.content: Congratualtions on launching your fonts on Myfonts. Looking at the samples the spacing/kerning of the Fo and fo is bad - feel free to tell me to FO if you like :-)

Sorry but i didn't understand the Fo issue, what is fo?

Joel Santos // youremin  
sound & visual

Si, you made me snort out loud. That is hilarious.

Joel, he just means the space in between you F and o is too wide.

Parabéns!

oh i get it... it takes time... no prob sii thanks for telling me i'll change that...

Tiffany, portuguese words? Ehehe

Well, now the objective is:  
Finishing the "clarendon" i have, doing an italic and doing a scripted. For these last ones, i'll need more knowledge.

Joel Santos // youremin  
sound & visual
